channel.title: Projects on Shubham Apat
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Shubham Apat

item.title: LinkedIn Scraper - Bypassing Google reCAPTCHA and LinkedIn's Anti-Scraping
item.description: How I built a LinkedIn scraper that works without login and bypasses Google's reCAPTCHA

item.title: I Used OpenAI CLIP for Image Moderation - No Training Required
item.description: How I built an image moderation system using CLIP's zero-shot learning, achieving 92% accuracy with just prompt engineering

item.title: Student ID Verification Pipeline for dip
item.description: Comprehensive ID verification pipeline using YOLOv8, UNet, and DenseNet121 for detecting forged ID cards with multiple validation layers.

item.title: I Optimized a 3GB Dashboard from 90 Seconds to 1 Second (90x Speedup)
item.description: How I built an interactive dashboard for student businesses and achieved 90x performance improvement

item.title: Individual Identification of Mugger Crocodiles using YOLOv8
item.description:
Built a YOLOv8-based model to identify 160+ individual free-ranging crocodiles from UAV imagery with 98.5% accuracy.
Optimized training on Param Shavak supercomputer using custom CLI scripts for data processing.

item.title: BookMyShow Scraper - I Got 60x Speedup by Running 4 Windows Instead of Threads
item.description: How I scraped BookMyShow's highly secured platform and achieved 60x performance improvement using a clever Windows GUI trick

item.title: Remote Sensing-Based Mangrove Classification
item.description: Developed a mangrove classification model for India using Sentinel-2A multispectral imagery and Random Forest classifier with 99.03% accuracy.

item.title: Real-Time Self-Driving Car with Lane Detection
item.description: Built a Raspberry Pi-based self-driving car capable of lane detection, obstacle avoidance, and path navigation using real-time image processing.
